af_ZA {
    Version { "2.0" }

    NumberPatterns { 
        "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
        "\u00a4#,##0.00;-\u00a4#,##0.00",
        "#,##0%",
        "#E0",
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm a",
                "EEEE dd MMMM yyyy",
                "dd MMMM yyyy",
                "dd MMM yyyy",
                "yyyy/MM/dd",
                "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
